name: @mubite/monorepo
description: MUBITE Testing Challenge - Modular Monolith with Next.js and Express

scripts.setup: cp -n apps/backend/.env.local.example apps/backend/.env.local 2>/dev/null; cp -n apps/frontend/.env.local.example apps/frontend/.env.local 2>/dev/null; npm install
scripts.start: npm run setup && npm run dev
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev -w @mubite/backend" "npm run dev -w @mubite/frontend"
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/dist apps/*/dist apps/*/.next
